resources.string: "Couldn't calibrate. Move away from the pattern and try again."
"Couldn't calibrate. Move closer to the pattern and try again."
Calibration Failed,Please note the lens matching relations!
Make sure the dotted squares touch the boundaries of this frame
The camera is not calibrated. Please complete the calibration.

"Test instructions:
1.Tap the calibration button. 2.There will be a calibration pass label to indicate the camera has been calibrated. 3.Carry out the calibration according to the prompt of the returned result. After the calibration is successful, click Pass. 4.Reboot your device to calibrate data and apply changes."
